description: The AWS::ElastiCache::ServerlessCache resource creates an Amazon ElastiCache Serverless Cache.

CacheUsageLimits.description: The cache capacity limit of the Serverless Cache.
CacheUsageLimits.markdownDescription:
The cache capacity limit of the Serverless Cache.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DataStorage.description: The cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

Maximum.description: The maximum cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.
Maximum.markdownDescription:
The maximum cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Unit.description: The unix of cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.
Unit.markdownDescription:
The unix of cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GB  
Update requires: No interruption

DataStorage.markdownDescription:
The cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ECPUPerSecond.description: The ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.

Maximum.description: The maximum ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.
Maximum.markdownDescription:
The maximum ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ECPUPerSecond.markdownDescription:

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with Serverless Cache.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with Serverless Cache.
